name: Beacon of Luck
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Gods © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M/DF (a tuft of rabbit fur)
text: You send out a burst of luck with a 30-foot radius centered around you. While the beacon of luck is in effect, you gain a +2 sacred bonus on all saving throws. As an immediate action before a saving throw is made, allies within the area can choose to benefit from this luck, rolling twice for a saving throw and taking the better result. Once a creature benefits from the beacon of luck in this way, it cannot gain the benefit of this spell for 24 hours.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一撮兔毛）
text_zh: 你成为散发好运的信标，在法术生效期间，你在豁免检定上获得+2神圣加值。在你周围30尺内的所有盟友都可以被运气所浸染，可以在一次豁免检定上双骰取高。如果一个生物通过这种方法获得了幸运灯塔的好处，那么他在接下来的24小时内无法在获得此法术的好处。
